html:
2026-0130
2026-02-13GACSpecial Economic Measures ActRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations in order to (1) repeal of certain economic prohibitions; (2) add and modify of listing criteria (3) Delisting and listings of entities and persons; (4) update language for clarification and consistency; (5) Update an exception relating to support for the organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and other Remaining prohibitions.Registration: SOR/2026-0023 Publication Date: 2026-02-25
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations in order to (1) repeal of certain economic prohibitions; (2) add and modify of listing criteria (3) Delisting and listings of entities and persons; (4) update language for clarification and consistency; (5) Update an exception relating to support for the organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and other Remaining prohibitions.
